TOTAL UNIT RELOCATING TO HOUSTON FROM DENVER

Total Energy Resources Inc, a wholly owned bysdisiary of French national energy company TOTAL Compagne Francaise des Petroles, said it will relocate its offices to Houston from Denver as part of TOTAL's plan to expand U.S. operations. Reuter
